name: Siren
passiveDesc: Siren's Attacks' Tide DMG is replaced Violet-Tainted Tide DMG. This DMG inherit all Tide DMG effects, buffs, and debuffs. Supercharged Reactions triggered by Violet-Tainted Tide DMG can trigger Critical Hits. The Critical values of the Special Supercharged Reactions are fixed at 15% Crit Rate and 100% Crit DMG. If there are Volte-Type characters in the team, Special Supercharged Reaction Crit Rate is increased by 15% and Crit DMG is increased by 20%.
rTalentDesc: Dealing Disorder DMG to opponents accumulates 1 Echo Memory and 5 energy. Triggering Supercharged Reactions generates additional 3 Echo Memory and 15 energy.
normalAttackDesc: Siren deals 14 (+24% Magic PWR) as Viloet-Tainted Tide DMG to the opponent.
chargedAttackDesc: Siren deals 44 (+54.2% Magic PWR) as Violet-Tainted Tide DMG to the opponent.
normalSkillDesc:
[20EM] Siren deploys a Love-Tied Plushi near the target opponent for 4 Cycles. Each cycle, the Plushi deals 88 (+34% Magic PWR) as AoE Violet-Tainted Tide DMG to the target and two nearby opponents.
[14EM] Siren deploys a Violet-Tied Plushi near the target opponent for 6 Cycles. Each cycle, the Plushi deals 101 (+66% Magic PWR) as AoE Violet-Tainted Tide DMG to the target and two nearby opponents. This DMG is considered Reaction DMG.
[21EM] Siren deploys a Violet-Feathered Plushi near the target opponent for 8 Cycles. Each cycle, the Plushi deals 121 (+81% Magic PWR) as AoE Violet-Tainted Tide DMG to the target and two nearby opponents and reducing their Reaction RES by 8%. This DMG is considered Special Supercharged Reaction DMG.
riftedSkillName: Rifted Skill - Full Bloom Violet Raid
riftedSkillDesc:
Siren unleashes a Full Bloom Violet Raid, dealing 222 (+88% Magic PWR) as AoE Violet-Tainted Tide DMG to all opponents. The following additional effects will occour based on the deployed Plushi:
Love-Tied Plushi: Increases all team members' Knowledge Unit by 40.
Violet-Tied Plushi: Increases all team member's Reaction DMG Bonus by 20%.
Violet-Feathered Plushi: Decreases all opponent's Reaction RES by 8%, Tide RES by 12%, and Volte RES by 12%.
fragment1Desc: Siren's Plushies will stay on the field for 2 additional Cycles.
fragment2Desc: All Supercharged Reactions triggered by Viloet-Tainted Tide DMG will deal additional DMG based on 500% of Siren's Knowledge Unit. Additionally, her Special Supercharged Reaction DMG Bonus is increased by 80%.
fragment3Desc: "Home of Plushies" level is increased by 3.
fragment4Desc: Siren's Plushies AoE now deals DMG to all opponents on the field. Additionally, an extra instance of DMG is dealt while deploying Plushies, dealing 100% of Siren's Magic PWR multiplied by 400% of Siren's Knowledge Unit as AoE Violet-Tainted Tide DMG.
fragment5Desc: "Full Bloom Violet Raid" level is increased by 3.
fragment6Desc:
Siren's Tide DMG is increased by 40%. Siren's Rifted Skill "Full Bloom Violet Raid" will consumes all deployed Plushies and additional effects will occour based on the consumed Plushies:
Love-Tied Plushi: All team members' Knowledge Unit is increased by 120.
Violet-Tied Plushi: Increases all team member's Reaction DMG Bonus by 40%.
Violet-Feathered Plushi: Decreases all opponent's Reaction RES by 40%, Tide RES by 20%, and Volte RES by 20%. The lower-tiered effects will still apply when a higher-tiered Plushi is consumed.

record2.description:
Siren (↓): After extended amount of discussion and testing, Siren is too overpowered in her Reactions capabilities. We decided to restrict her Special Reactions to a specific category.
	Passive Talent: Violet-Tained Love (↓): Reactions triggered by Violet-Tainted Tide DMG can trigger Critical Hits based on Siren's Crit Rate and 92% of entire team Crit DMG >> Supercharged Reactions triggered by Violet-Tainted Tide DMG can trigger Critical Hits. The Critical values of the Special Supercharged Reactions are fixed at 15% Crit Rate and 100% Crit DMG. If there are Volte-Type characters in the team, Special Supercharged Reaction Crit Rate is increased by 15% and Crit DMG is increased by 20%.
	Rifted Disorder (↓): Triggering reactions generates additional 3 Echo Memory and 15 energy >> Triggering Supercharged Reactions generates additional 3 Echo Memory and 15 energy.
	F2 - Tide of Affection (~): All reactions triggered by Viloet-Tainted Tide DMG will deal additional DMG based on 500% of Siren's Knowledge Unit. Additionally, her Reaction DMG Bonus is increased by 40% >> All Supercharged Reactions triggered by Viloet-Tainted Tide DMG will deal additional DMG based on 500% of Siren's Knowledge Unit. Additionally, her Special Supercharged Reaction DMG Bonus is increased by 80%.
